title: How can a early stage startup be published on some startup news site? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are multiple places where a startup can be published. Some of them I remember at the top of my mind is: Your StoryNext Big WhatThe Startup BuzzEven I am in a similar field, have recently started a website The Veda for Startups which also covers startup news. You can write to me at connect@shuruveda.com and we can take this opportunity forward.

The best startup news site I know is Youth Incorporated. You can contact them to publish your story and ask them what they charge or expect to cover a story. I guess they only cover startups with a unique idea or if their foundation story interests them.
